name: .DICTIONARY
summary: Learn about .DICTIONARY files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

instructions: You should not attempt to open DICTIONARY files manually. Instead, the Apple Dictionary app automatically loads the information in the DICTIONARY file.

In macOS, you can right-click a DICTIONARY file and select Show Package Contents to view the package's directories and files with Apple Finder. For example, each DICTIONARY file contains a binary Body.data file in the Dictionary Contents/​Resources/​ directory that stores the list of words in the dictionary.
NOTE: Modifying the contents in a DICTIONARY file may break the dictionary.
